Name: Choc Mint Alexander
Ingredients: 10 ml De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao
10 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
10 ml Giffard Peppermint Pastille crème de menthe
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of dust with chocolate powder & float mint leaf.
Review: A minty riff on the classic Alexander cocktail .
Nutrition: One serving of Choc Mint Alexander contains 237 calories
